name: humoristic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
funny, or having the characteristics of a humorist (= a person who writes or tells funny stories): The book deals with a lot of serious religious themes in both a humoristic and a serious way. She is a strong, positive person with a humoristic spirit.
More examplesFewer examplesThe text is written in a humoristic way, and is intentionally full of stereotypes.He is a traveller and, above all, a storyteller with a humoristic and anecdotal style.The concept was introduced by the Canadian sociologist in his humoristic book.
